turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I need to order two pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like them both pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, 2 medium, gluten free crust pizzas with pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $38, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That'd be all. Thank you.
